mapper.select: select * from student WHERE student_id = #{userId} AND student_password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into student (student_id, student_name, student_class, student_email, student_password, student_gender) VALUES(#{studentId},#{studentName},#{studentClass},#{studentEmail},#{studentPassword},#{studentGender})
